author: Pavan Kumar
text:
In Kannada there is a saying

"ತನ್ನ ತಲೆಮೇಲೆ ತಾನೇ ಚಪ್ಡಿಕಲ್ಲು ಏಳದು ಕೊಳ್ಳೋದು"

Which symbolically translates to "khud ke pair pe ghulati marna"

First shoo away companies from state, later cry. https://t.co/s6FOFh04l8
